item.title: Nascar and Truck Racing
item.description: Flo With A Big Truck

item.title: Trial Sant Joan De Les Abadesse
item.description:
3 Day trial Final Section

On good Friday we drove to Camprodon in Girona to meet with Kenny and his Partner Andrew for a 3 day trial in Sant Joan de les Abadesse. We stayed in the hotel Puig Franc√≥ owned by a trials enthusiastic, so the hotel has a trials theme all the rooms are named after famous riders and loads of motor cycle pictures adorned the walls.

item.title: Moto GP
item.description: 2019-11-15 Motogp Practice. We all got up bright and early to get to the track in good time. Watched both Motogp sessions ebikes and Motogp, bright sunny day but bitterly cold wind. Also some retail therapy.
